column2: "Alright, now that that's taken care of, we need to get to work."
"I've established the exact timestamp of the earliest deleted records. If you go back to that point in time, you might just learn something."
"It should be fairly similar to the time travel you've experienced before."
"I'm sure you'll be able to do this. After all, no one's more experienced at jumping back in time than you."

"...It's possible that Xion anticipated all of this.
...Maybe that's why she chose you."
"Head for the location. Leave the backup to me."
"Let's find out what really happened back then."
"You have received the Matter Board [Her birth and then...]"
